variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: FRAMINGHAM HEART STUDY COHORT IDENTIFIER
variable.comment: Must be used in conjunction with ID.

variable.name: DATETYPE
variable.description: STUDY TYPE
variable.value: Echo done on a different day

variable.name: EXAM
variable.description: EXAM NUMBER

variable.name: SQAOLA
variable.description: STUDY QUALITY - Quantitative: M-mode Ao/LA (Aorta/Left Atrium)

variable.name: SQLV
variable.description: STUDY QUALITY - Quantitative: M-mode LV (Left Ventricle)

variable.name: SQMITINF
variable.description: STUDY QUALITY - Quantitative: PW (Pulsed Wave) Doppler mitral inflow

variable.name: SQ2D
variable.description: STUDY QUALITY - Qualitative: 2-D study

variable.name: SQCWAV
variable.description: STUDY QUALITY - Qualitative: CW AV (Continuous Wave Aortic Valve Doppler)

variable.name: SQCOLDOP
variable.description: STUDY QUALITY - Qualitative: Color Doppler

variable.name: SQOVER
variable.description: OVERALL STUDY QUALITY

variable.name: VID_ONLY
variable.description: VIDEO IMAGES ONLY AVAILABLE
variable.comment: If neither box is checked, then both video and digital images were available for measuring.
variable.value: Box checked, only video images available for measuring
Unknown or box not checked (if both digital and video images ARE available then box is NOT checked)

variable.name: DIG_ONLY
variable.description: DIGITAL IMAGES ONLY AVAILABLE
variable.comment: If neither box is checked, then both video and digital images were available for measuring.
variable.value: Box checked, only digital images available for measuring
Unknown or box not checked (if both digital and video images ARE available then box is NOT checked)

variable.name: TECHLIM
variable.description: TECHNICALLY LIMITED STUDY

variable.name: x349
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Basal Anterior Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_BasAnt_Score)

variable.name: x350
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Basal Anterior Lateral Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_BasAntLat_Score)

variable.name: x351
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Basal Posterior Lateral Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_BasPostLat_Score)

variable.name: x352
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Basal Inferior Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_BasInf_Score)

variable.name: x353
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Basal Inferior Septum Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_BasInfSep_Score)

variable.name: x354
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Basal Anterior Septum Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_BasAntSep_Score)

variable.name: x355
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Mid Anterior Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_MidAnt_Score)

variable.name: x356
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Mid Anterior Lateral Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_MidAntLat_Score)

variable.name: x357
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Mid Posterior Lateral Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_MidPostLat_Score)

variable.name: x358
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Mid Inferior Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_MidInf_Score)

variable.name: x359
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Mid Inferior Septum Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_MidInfSep_Score)

variable.name: x360
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Mid Anterior Septum Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_MidAntSep_Score)

variable.name: x361
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Apical Anterior Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_ApicalAnt_Score)

variable.name: x362
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Apical Lateral Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_ApicalLat_Score)

variable.name: x363
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Apical Inferior Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_ApicalInf_Score)

variable.name: x364
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Apical Septum Wall Motion Score - resting (TwoD_WMResting_ApicalSep_Score)

variable.name: x16
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Aortic Root Diameter - average (Mmode_AOandLA_AoRt_avg)

variable.name: x23
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Atrium Internal Dimension systole - average (Mmode_AOandLA_LAIDs_avg)

variable.name: x26
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Internal Dimension diastole - average (TwoD__LVIDd_avg)

variable.name: x29
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Two Chamber View Left Ventricular End Diastole Volume - average (TwoD_2CH_LVEDV_avg)

variable.name: x32
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Two Chamber View Left Ventricular End Systole Volume - average (TwoD_2CH_LVESV_avg)

variable.name: x35
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Two Chamber View Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction - average (TwoD_2CH_LVEF_avg)

variable.name: x38
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Two Chamber View Left Ventricular Mass - average (TwoD_2CH_LVMass_avg)

variable.name: x41
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Two Chamber View Mitral Valve Annulus Diameter - average (TwoD_2CH_MVAnn_avg)

variable.name: x48
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Atrium Internal Dimension diastole - average (Mmode_AOandLA_LAIDd_avg)

variable.name: x55
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Aortic Valve (cusps) Separation - average (Mmode_AOandLA_AVsep_avg)

variable.name: x62
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT InterVentricle Septum Thickness diastole - average (Mmode_LVandRV_IVSd_avg)

variable.name: x69
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Posterior Wall Thickness diastole - average (Mmode_LVandRV_LVPWd_avg)

variable.name: x76
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Internal Dimension diastole - average (Mmode_LVandRV_LVIDd_avg)

variable.name: x83
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Internal Dimension systole - average (Mmode_LVandRV_LVIDs_avg)

variable.name: x90
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT InterVentricular Septum Thickness systole - average (Mmode_LVandRV_IVSs_avg)

variable.name: x97
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Posterior Wall Thickness systole - average (Mmode_LVandRV_LVPWs_avg)

variable.name: x104
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Percentage Fractional Shortening (Mmode_LVandRV_LVpcntfs)
variable.comment: Formula used to calculate X104: ((X76 - X83) / X76) * 100 For each variable in the calculation an average measurement was used.

variable.name: x111
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular End Diastolic Volume (Mmode_LVandRV_LVEDV)
variable.comment: Formula used to calculate X111: (X76^3 * 7.0) / (2.4 + X76) For each variable in the calculation an average measurement was used.

variable.name: x118
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular End Systolic Volume (Mmode_LVandRV_LVESV)
variable.comment: Formula used to calculate X118: (X83^3 * 7.0) / (2.4 + X83) For each variable in the calculation an average measurement was used.

variable.name: x125
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Stroke Volume (Mmode_LVandRV_LVSV)
variable.comment: Formula used to calculate X125: X111 - X118 For each variable in the calculation an average measurement was used.

variable.name: x132
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (Mmode_LVandRV_LVEF)
variable.comment: Formula used to calculate X132: (X125 / X111) * 100 For each variable in the calculation an average measurement was used.

variable.name: x139
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Heart Rate - average (Mmode_LVandRV_HR_avg)

variable.name: x153
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Left Ventricular Mass (Mmode_LVandRV_LVMass)
variable.comment: Formula used to calculate X153: 0.8 * 1.04 * [(X76 + X62 + X69)^3 - X76^3] + 0.6 For each variable in the calculation an average measurement was used.

variable.name: x171
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Parasternal Short Axis Ice Pick Left Ventricular Internal Dimension diastole - average (TwoD_PLA_LVIDd_avg)

variable.name: x178
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Parasternal Short Axis Ice Pick Left Ventricular Internal Dimension systole - average (TwoD_PLA_LVIDs_avg)

variable.name: x185
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Parasternal Short Axis Ice Pick Left Ventricular Percentage Fractional Shortening - average (TwoD_PLA_LVpcntfs_avg)

variable.name: x192
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Parasternal Short Axis Ice Pick InterVentricular Septum Thickness diastole - average (TwoD_PLA_IVSd_avg)

variable.name: x199
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Parasternal Short Axis Ice Pick Left Ventricular Posterial Wall Thickness diastole - average (TwoD_PLA_LVPWd_avg)

variable.name: x206
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Parasternal Short Axis Ice Pick Left Ventricular Wall Mean Thickness - average (TwoD_PLA_LVWmn_avg)

variable.name: x225
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Short Axis Left Ventricular Mean Internal Diameter diastole - average (TwoD_SAX_LVIDmnd_avg)

variable.name: x228
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Short Axis Left Ventricular Mean Internal Diameter systole - average (TwoD_SAX_LVIDmns_avg)

variable.name: x231
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Short Axis Left Ventricular Mean Fractional Shortening - average (TwoD_SAX_LVmnfs_avg)

variable.name: x234
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Short Axis Left Ventricular Mean Wall Thickness - average (TwoD_SAX_LVWmn_avg)

variable.name: x237
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Short Axis Left Ventricular Epicardial Area diastole - average (TwoD_SAX_LVAPd_avg)

variable.name: x240
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Short Axis Left Ventricular Endocardial Area diastole - average (TwoD_SAX_LVANd_avg)

variable.name: x280
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Mitral Valve E-Point Septal Separation - average (Mmode__MVepss_avg)

variable.name: x285
variable.description: M-MODE MEASUREMENT Mitral Valve Annular Descent - average (Mmode__MVAnnDes_avg)

variable.name: x365
variable.description: 2-D MEASUREMENT Wall Motion Score Index - resting (TwoD_WMResting_ScoreIndex)
variable.comment: The scoring was calculated according to the following algorithm: WMSI (Wall Motion Score Index) = Sum of visualized segments / Total number of segments visualized
